title: Cheat Sheet AI
description: An AI-powered cheat sheet generator that builds cheat sheets based on a students course material.

title: Graph Theory
description: An interactive web application that visualizes graph theory algorithms. Built to make learning graph theory more intuitive by letting you watch algorithms like BFS, DFS, Dijkstra's and more run in real-time on your custom graphs.

title: Bikewatching
description: An interactive map visualization of Boston's bike lanes and Bluebikes stations, showing traffic patterns and flow throughout the day. Features include time-based filtering, color-coded traffic flow indicators, and detailed station information.

title: Firebase Authentication System
description: Developed a comprehensive authentication system with email verification, Google sign-in, and protected routes using Firebase and React. Features include email/password registration, Google OAuth integration, email verification flow, and secure route protection with React Router.

title: Nexon America Data Analytics
description: Led development of a Lifetime Value analysis system for MapleStory players using Snowflake SQL and Tableau. Created cohort analysis systems and collaborated with Data Science team on player classification models. Built comprehensive dashboards to visualize player behavior and campaign performance metrics.

title: Data Science Alliance Research
description: Collaborated with the Data Science Alliance to optimize food bank placements in San Diego County by developing a model incorporating demographics, income, and location data, and creating an interactive dashboard for stakeholders.

title: San Diego Supercomputer Center Research
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict and compress matrix values derived from plasma physics simulations, achieving approximately 85% accuracy on unseen data and contributing to optimized data management for large-scale computational simulations.

title: Deal Finder
description: A webscraper that uses the Segment Anything Model to extract prices from grocery store advertisements, helping users find the best deals at local supermarkets.

title: League of Legends Predictive Analysis
description: A data science project analyzing over 10,000 professional League of Legends matches to predict game outcomes based on early-game performance metrics.

title: Email Summarizer
description: A web application that uses AI to provide concise summaries of your Gmail inbox from the last 24 hours, built with React, Flask, and OpenAI's API.

title: Sharp Healthcare AI Voice Assistant
description: A voice assistant that enables natural conversations with an AI using built for integration with the Sharp Healthcare app.

title: Jurassic Classifier
description: A deep learning web application that identifies 15 different dinosaur species from uploaded images using an ensemble of convolutional neural networks.

title: Hotel Review Sentiment Analysis
description: A deep learning web application trained on 20,000+ hotel reviews that predicts hotel review ratings (1-5 stars) based on user input text.
